event.title: South West Ruby #11 : Lightning Talks
event.description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol, this month for lightning talks. Expect another Ruby packed evening with great conversations, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:30 - 19:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees.

19:00-20:00 Lightning Talks

Adam Butler - Better logs with Rails, Logstash & Kibana

Ollie H.M - Compilingâ€‹ a timeline with UNION

Richard Brooke - Java is for Platonists and Ruby is for Aristotelians

Stefan Magnuson - Techniques for reworking long/TCR-style branches

20:00-20:30 - Socialise and network.
